title: Ghost of Tsushima Director's Cut Looks Fantastic - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.21.21
description:
Blessing and Andy talk about new details on Ghost of Tsushima Director's Cut, Netflix going for mobile gaming, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:10:10 - Housekeeping
A new Gamescast about Metal Gear Solid AND a Party Mode previewing Aliens: Fireteam Elite are up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
If that’s not enough games content, we’re streaming Doki Doki Literature Club right after this episode of KFGD right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:16:30 - Ghost of Tsushima Director’s Cut looks sick
00:26:00 - Netflix’s gaming expansion starts with mobile - Jay Peters @ The Verge
00:36:36 -  District 9’s Neill Blomkamp is working on a video game!
00:43:42 -  Ad
00:46:55 - Pro Evolution Soccer has been renamed eFootball, and It's Fully Free-to-Play - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:49:48 - Could eFootball represent a direction that other sports titles such as FIFA, Madden and NBA 2K adopt in the near future? - Best Friends Q:Dave Norridge
00:56:30 -  Epic Games has acquired Sketchfab - Sean Murray @ TheGamer
00:59:45 - Ubisoft’s Tom Clancy Mash-Up Game Elite Squad Is Shutting Down - Matt Purslow @ IGN
01:02:20 - EA Sports PGA Tour to feature women’s golf - Matt Purslow @ IGN
01:04:20 - We’re getting three more SNES games with Nintendo Switch Online and none of them are Earthbound - Wario64
01:07:20Could eFootball represent a direction that other sports titles such as FIFA, Madden and NBA 2K adopt in the near future? - Out today
01:09:55 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim and Tamoor
